title: Gina Marie Sequeira, MD, MS
description: Gina Marie Sequeira, MD, MS, Co-Director, Gender Clinic
cleaned_text: since September 2020 Children's Title: Co-Director, Gender Clinic "My mission is to make gender-affirming care accessible for all youth. " - I grew up in a small town just west of Houston, TX and moved to New Orleans to complete my undergraduate degree in Biomedical Engineering at Tulane University. Prior to heading back to New Orleans for medical school I taught high school Math in Jacksonville, Florida with Teach for America. I then moved to Pittsburgh to complete my residency in Pediatrics, fellowship in Adolescent Medicine and Masters in clinical research at the Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh. Outside of work I love to travel, explore new restaurants and spend time outdoors hiking and playing flag football. - - Award Name Award Description Awarded By Award Date UPMC Dignity and Respect Champion Award 2018 -
